title: A Continent on guard
creator_credit: Bob Walker, Peter Johnson and Film Australia
brief_description: Presents a dramatic, simulated investigation into a suspected outbreak of foot and mouth disease in Australia, and points out what measures would be taken to eradicate the disease. Note: A complementary production to ‘The constant threat’
